reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crystal Clear Sound in a Compact Package
reviews.reviewText: The Sony Compact Stereo Lavalier Microphone ECMLV1 is an absolute game-changer for anyone seeking exceptional audio quality in a portable solution. From the moment I started using this microphone, I was captivated by its ability to capture crystal-clear sound in a variety of recording situations.One of the most impressive aspects of the ECMLV1 microphone is its compact size and lightweight design. It's incredibly easy to clip onto clothing, making it a versatile tool for interviews, presentations, vlogs, and more. Despite its unobtrusive form factor, the microphone's performance is nothing short of remarkable.The stereo recording capability of the ECMLV1 adds a layer of depth and realism to recordings. The resulting audio captures the ambiance of the environment and enhances the overall listening experience. Whether I'm capturing conversations or ambient sounds, the microphone's stereo output adds a professional touch to my recordings.The microphone's omnidirectional pickup pattern is a blessing, ensuring that it captures sound evenly from all directions. This is particularly advantageous in dynamic recording environments where the speaker's movements might vary. The microphone's ability to handle a wide frequency range contributes to its versatility, delivering accurate and balanced sound reproduction.The ECMLV1's sensitivity to sound ensures that even soft-spoken voices are captured with exceptional clarity. This is a significant advantage in scenarios where preserving the nuances of speech is essential.Another standout feature is the microphone's compatibility with a range of devices. Whether I'm connecting it to a camera, smartphone, audio recorder, or other equipment, the microphone delivers consistent and high-quality sound.In conclusion, the Sony Compact Stereo Lavalier Microphone ECMLV1 is a true testament to Sony's commitment to excellence in audio technology. Its compact design, stereo recording capabilities, and pristine sound quality make it a must-have accessory for content creators, journalists, educators, and anyone seeking top-notch audio recordings. The ECMLV1 has exceeded my expectations and has become an essential part of my recording setup. If you're in search of a microphone that combines portability, versatility, and exceptional sound, look no further. The Sony ECMLV1 microphone is a game-changer that elevates your audio recordings to a whole new level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Stereo Lavalier For The Money
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lavalier microphone as the sound quality it provides is excellent. I am using this Lavalier With The Fulaim X5 Wireless Lavalier System and have been extremely pleased with the sound quality delivered by this pairing. My only criticism of this lavalier is that it is setup to be horizontally worn on the body (as you'll see in the product photos). This certainly doesn't detract in any way from the microphone which is why I did not lower my rating because of it. Rather, from an aesthetics perspective, it is my personal preference to have a lavalier that is laterally worn. This can be accomplished with the Sony Lavalier (which is how I use it) and it does not detract from the sound quality; however, in wearing it in this way it would probably seem slightly larger than other comparable external microphones. Regardless, for a sub $50 microphone, it really is quite a good value for excellent sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good lav mic
reviews.reviewText: I am happy with this lav mic. The foam wind screen doesn't stay on very good. I picked up two dead cats and sewed them together so they can't come off. Helped step up my interview production.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work with smartphone (unless you have a joiner cable)
reviews.reviewText: I had to return it because it only has the 2-ring jack, and my phone only records with 3-ring jacks. It's probably a good mic, but I couldn't use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works great as a card hands free microphone
reviews.reviewText: I have a double din alpine ILX-W650 headunit and wanted a good microphone for when I get calls while on the road. This one is pretty good but I like the sleek design with the swivel head the most. I did need an extension to be able to run the mic properly since this mic is only like 3ft long. Still it work good and looks / works better than the cheap $5 ones. You can easily center the mic in your car and swivel the head to pic up audio from L and Right. Like driver and passenger. gave me that modern car quality hands free experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Decent Sound Quality, Below Par Cable and Clamp
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the quality of the microphone for my PC. I plugged it into the 3.5mm microphone jack on my motherboard. My major gripes with this product are the very short 1-meter-long cable, and the poor clamping pressure the clip exerts on my clothes or other objects. I ended up zip-tying the microphone cable to my computer's headphone cable, to get that added rigidity and to bypass that annoyingly small and flimsy clamp.Edit: After two years, I realized the range of this mic isn't very good. In meetings, I'm not heard very well. Got tired of holding the mic next to my mouth. Ended up switching to my webcam microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Results and Great Value - A Solid 5/5 Stars!
reviews.reviewText: The Sony ECMLV 1lav is an absolute winner, especially when considering the cost-to-result ratio.This little gem works wonders and has exceeded my expectations. Using it is a breeze; simply plug it in, and you're good to go.The audio signal it produces is remarkably clean and free from any annoying noise.The microphone captures clear, crisp sound, making it a perfect choice for interviews, vlogs, and various recording scenarios.For the price, it's an outstanding performer, and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a reliable and budget-friendly lavalier microphone. Definitely swings above its weight class.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good Sounding Microphone If Subject Stands Still
reviews.reviewText: The recording quality is excellent with good volume. Unfortunately, it picks up every single tiny noise. Any slight movement of its cable will be clearly heard in the recording. So unless you spend the time to properly isolate this microphone the recording will be full of obnoxious rustling noises.

Qualidade excelente! Por um custo baixo (em relação a outros de igual qualidade), vocÊ consegue uma qualidade ótima de áudio!Se seu objetivo é usá-lo para o YouTube (como é meu caso), esse produto é ótimo!

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente apoyo para entrevistas en espacios abiertos
reviews.reviewText: Es un excelente auxiliar, para empleo en grabadora de reportaje SONY; ya que tenia problemas con las entrevistas en espacios abiertos sobre todo donde al viento y ruido de fondo; al colocar el micrófono en el entrevistado se evita en gran medida el ruido de fondo y viento.

Right off the bat, I know some people are going to complain that the cord is too short. Two things:- if clipping it to your shirt/jacket and plugging into a camera you're using for vlogging handheld, this is the perfect length of cord: Not too long to trip over and not so short that it's going to dangle.- If recording to an external audio device, be it a transmitter or a handheld thing like a Zoom F1 that you're keeping in your pocket, it's again the perfect length.If you need a longer cord, any of the headphone extension cables found on Amazon work perfectly fine (which I've also used when in a studio streaming setup).The clarity and sound quality out of this stereo mic is perfect, and if you're going to only record mono, just turn it so that the left channel is facing upwards. I love the ability to turn it in multiple directions depending on the side of jacket I'm wearing it on.
Stereo perfeito só falta agora ter saída USB C

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good, used previous model, bought again this one
reviews.reviewText: For YouTube videos and streams it is very good. I used previous model (discontinued) until accidentally broke the cable. Have been looking only it again but because that model discontinued I bought this one basically without hesitation, just checked to be sure few reviews on YouTube.Not sure about noise cancellation, my room is pretty quiet.Con: I think the cord can be at least 50% longer, I needed an extension, and it is even considering that my PC is under the table close to my feet.
